832460.name: Bullet Blade
832460.description:
The world of New Haven is a wasteland. The ARC Empire destroyed it with a single Mutagen Bomb that transformed it’s habitants to mutated monsters.

Fight back with the power of the Bullet Blade in this classic co-op 2D action-platformer as the heroes become the last hope for the United Resistance.

Deflect bullets back at enemies and gain powerful abilities to dash, bounce, and blast through creepy creatures, mutated soldiers and huge bosses. It’s up to you to stop the ARC from achieving world domination.

Features:

• Play through dozens of levels chock-full of secrets, challenging platforming and huge mutated bosses.

• Intuitive combat system that mixes hack and slash action and run and gun gameplay.

• Purchase and upgrade powerful weapons with devastating abilities

• Full couch co-op adventure that span over 3 continents with unique biomes..

• Beautiful hand-drawn cartoon graphics and fluid animation bring the world of Bullet Blade to life.
